description:
Bonobono has a cold. His dad places the two ends of a large rock on his and Bonobono`s foreheads, then touches the ends, saying Bonobono does not have a fever. Chipmunk places one hand on Bonobono`s forehead and the other on his own, then puts them together and says Bonobono does not have a fever. There are so ways of checking! Bonobono asks Chipmunk if there`s any way to help his cold get better.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: How Does a Cold Get Better?
Kaze wa Dou Yatte Naoru no Darou
カゼはどうやって治るのだろう
